mapper.sql: a.id as id, c.id as "contract.id", c.contractNo as "contract.contractNo", b.name as "userId.name", b.id as "userId.id", a.main_time as mainTime, a.next_main_time as nextMainTime, a.create_by as createBy, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_by as updateBy, a.update_date as updateDate, a.remarks as remarks, a.del_flag as delFlag, a.main_content as mainContent
left join sys_user b on b.id = a.mainId LEFT JOIN purifier_contract c on c.id = a.contractId
mapper.insert: Insert INTO purifier_maintain( contractId, main_time, next_main_time, mainId, create_by, create_date, del_flag, main_content ) VALUES ( #{contract.id}, #{mainTime}, #{nextMainTime}, #{userId.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, '0', #{mainContent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE purifier_maintain a SET a.update_by = #{updateBy.id}, a.main_time=#{mainTime}, a.next_main_time=#{nextMainTime}, a.main_content=#{mainContent}, a.mainId=#{userId.id}, a.remarks=#{remarks}, a.update_date = #{updateDate} where a.id= #{id}
